009package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntInt;
016import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.nonlinear.BilinearMapping2D;
017import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
018import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
019import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
020import imagingbook.common.image.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
021import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
022import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
023
024/**
025 * <p>
026 * ImageJ plugin, applies a bilinear transformation derived from a pair of
027 * quadrilaterals P, Q (for the source and target image, respectively) to the current
028 * image. See Sec. 21.1.4 of [1] for details. Optionally opens a sample image if
029 * no image is currently open.
030 * </p>
031 * <p>
032 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
033 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
034 * </p>
035 * 
036 * @author WB
037 * @version 2022/11/28
038 * 
039 * @see ImageMapper
040 * @see BilinearMapping2D
041 */
042public class Map_Bilinear implements PlugInFilter {
043        
044        private static Pnt2d[] P = {            // source quadrilateral
045                        PntInt.from(0, 0),
046                        PntInt.from(400, 0),
047                        PntInt.from(400, 400),
048                        PntInt.from(0, 400)
049        };
050
051        private static Pnt2d[] Q = {            // target quadrilateral
052                        PntInt.from(0, 60),
053                        PntInt.from(400, 20),
054                        PntInt.from(300, 400),
055                        PntInt.from(30, 200)
056        };
057        
058        /**
059         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
060         * is currently open.
061         */
062        public Map_Bilinear() {
063                if (IjUtils.noCurrentImage()) {
064                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
065                }
066        }
067        
068    @Override
069        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
070        return DOES_ALL;
071    }
072
073    @Override
074        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
075                // we want the inverse mapping (Q -> P, so we swap P/Q):
076                BilinearMapping2D mi = BilinearMapping2D.fromPoints(Q, P);
077                new ImageMapper(mi, OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic).map(ip);
078    }
079}
